citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on
24-Jan-17.
The USDA inspector and IDALS representative arrived at the facility at 10:30 am and knocked on the front door,
rang the door bell, and called the provided phone number and left a message. A household member arrived and
stated that the licensee was not available for the inspection. The USDA and IDALS officials left the facility 30
minutes after leaving the phone message.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on
24-Jan-17.
The USDA inspector and IDALS representative arrived at the facility at 10:30 am and knocked on the front door,
rang the door bell, and called the provided phone number and left a message.  A household member arrived and
stated that the licensee was not available for the inspection.  The USDA and IDALS officials left the facility 30
minutes after leaving the phone message.
